channel.title: Data Analysis on Tools for Academic Research
channel.description: Recent content in Data Analysis on Tools for Academic Research

item.title: MyLabBook
item.description: An open source research platform or ELN based on WordPress and the FAIR Data Toolkit that is Sustainable, Affordable, FAIR, and Easy.

item.title: Colorgorical
item.description: A categorical color generator for data visualizations. It takes into account of perceptual distance.

item.title: Graph Suchi Yomitori System (GSYS)
item.description: A tool to extract numerical values from graphs

item.title: WebPlotDigitizer
item.description: Web based tool to extract data from plots, images, and maps

item.title: SciTools
item.description: Open tools for the analysis and visualisation of Earth science data

item.title: Bashplotlib
item.description: plotting in the terminal using plaintext

item.title: Wolfram Alpha
item.description: Wolfram Alpha is an AI assistant that does data analysis in a smart way.
